Release the poor things!!!  That's the reason all these  hotels want you 
folks to go in and find them ghost's so they can make money off  the ghost's.
 
 
In a message dated 5/27/2009 4:32:10 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,  
cbreck@... writes:

 
 


You said that so well, Steve. I heartily agree.

Carol B.

Plus  I don't think the prison
> would appreciate me releaseing the  inmates before their eternal sentence
> has been served.
>  Steve
>
